data.oai_dc:dc: Number of biogeographical events estimated in the history of the subtribe Panicinae using biogeographical stochastic mapping. Event counts were averaged across 1000 BSMs and are presented here with the standard deviations in parentheses. Total event counts are given for range-expansion events (anagenetic dispersal) (a), founder events (cladogenetic dispersal) (b), and Sympatry speciation events (c).
